column4: hey all, is there any good alternative to gftp, every time I use it it ust crashes....
I would like something with a GUI andthat does ssh as well
the best way to check why program crashes is to run the program within the terminal.. go to terminal and type "gftp".. then if you are lucky you'll see some error messages
did you try running it from terminal and checked for any error messages?
no, just with the visual thing... I'm a new user just passed from win...
Applications -> Accessories -> Terminal.. then, type "gtfp".. then, paste the output to pastebin (if there is any output)
it just crashes.. nothing in the terminal?
Is that what I need to do?? Try and use it while the terminal window is opened???
you have to type "gftp" in the command line.. then you'll see the gui.. play around it.. when it crashes, if you are lucky.. you'll see some error messages
error messages in the terminal window
: ok I typed gftp and nothing happened
ok I'll try that and tell ya if I get any errors
